itShouldBeNotedThatTheProjectsInWhichIHa: It should be noted that the projects in which I have focused and dedicated my time the most are those carried out (the vast majority from scratch) for the companies for which I currently worked or I have worked,
whichIHaveNotIncludedInThisPortfolio: which I have not included in this portfolio
butIHighlightTheShinywallAndZycleApplica: but I would like to highlight the ShinyWall and Zycle apps.
currentlyMostOfTheseProjectsAreUnderDeve: Currently, most of these projects are under development, but their code is accessible from my
mboardText: My first desktop application. Created in Python with a local SQLite database for creating and editing climbing routes. There has been no continuity.
llocsText: One of my first Flutter apps, using Firebase Authentication, Firebase Firestore, and Firebase Storage. There has been no continuity.
conColegasText: This is one of my first Flutter apps. Very casual app for teenagers to hang out with friends, through the games 'Never have I ever', 'Truth or dare' and 'Who is more likely than'.
cubetsText: Arcade game with different levels in which you must collect coins and dodge enemies to move on to the next one. There has been no continuity.
cubetisText: Improvement of the Cubets game, applying a clean architecture and introducing new logics. Under development.
ebntzText: Social network that allows you to search by names of festivals and artists directly through the lineup of the event or festival using text recognition.
flutterTranslationsText: Program for generating translated literals for a Flutter application, in different formats, to facilitate this part of the development of an application that is sometimes somewhat cumbersome.
isSmallWidthText: To see more information about this project, access this page from a computer or tablet
